nodes.documentation:
@author Karen Suen
@title Stores and manages the state of all listings in the marketplace.
This is a low level storage contract that provides getters and setters for
creating, accessing and modifying listings. Currently, a reference is stored
for fetching the listing image from a distributed database due to the expensive
cost of storing large data on the blockchain. For optimisation reasons,
business logic should be implemented in the client application.
nodes.name: MarketStore

nodes.documentation: @dev Constructor initialises marketplace with 0 listings

nodes.name: createListingInStore
disableListing

nodes.documentation:
@notice Updates the given listing to SOLD state
@param _id The id of sold listing
nodes.name: listingSold

nodes.documentation:
@dev Update the given listing to available state
@param _id The id of listing to make available in marketplace
nodes.name: listingAvailable
getListing

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns a list of all listing id's created by an address (user)
@param _seller The address to retrieve all listing ids for
nodes.name: getAllSellerListings
getListingPrice

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the title of a given listing
@param _id The id of listing to retrieve title of
nodes.name: getListingTitle

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the description reference of a given listing
@param _id The id of listing to retrieve the description of
nodes.name: getListingDescription

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the image reference of a given listing
@param _id The id of listing to retrieve the image reference of
nodes.name: getListingImage

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the seller
@param _id The id of listing to retrieve the state of
nodes.name: getListingSeller

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the current state of a listing as an integer
@param _id The id of listing to retrieve the state of
nodes.name: getListingState

devdoc.author: Karen Suen

createListingInStore(uint256,string,stri.details: The unique ID of each listing is auto generated using the incremented total listing count. The list of seller's owned listings are also updated.

params._desc: The reference hash of listing description stored in a distributed database
params._image: The reference hash of listing image stored in a distributed database
params._price: The selling price of the new listing in Wei
params._seller: The seller address that created this listing (owner)
params._title: The title of the new listing

disableListing(uint256).details: Sold or disabled listings could be activated again (relisted)

params._id: The id of listing to disable

getAllSellerListings(address).details: Returns a list of all listing id's created by an address (user)

params._seller: The address to retrieve all listing ids for

getListing(uint256).details: The listing state enum value is returned as an integer

params._id: The id of listing to return

getListingDescription(uint256).details: Returns the description reference of a given listing

params._id: The id of listing to retrieve the description of

getListingImage(uint256).details: Returns the image reference of a given listing

params._id: The id of listing to retrieve the image reference of

getListingPrice(uint256).details: Returns the selling price of a given listing in Wei (smallest denomination of Ether)

params._id: The id of listing to retrieve selling price of
The id of listing to retrieve the state of

getListingState(uint256).details: Returns the current state of a listing as an integer

params._id: The id of listing to retrieve the state of

getListingTitle(uint256).details: Returns the title of a given listing

params._id: The id of listing to retrieve title of

listingAvailable(uint256).details: Update the given listing to available state

params._id: The id of listing to make available in marketplace

devdoc.title: Stores and manages the state of all listings in the marketplace. This is a low level storage contract that provides getters and setters for creating, accessing and modifying listings. Currently, a reference is stored for fetching the listing image from a distributed database due to the expensive cost of storing large data on the blockchain. For optimisation reasons, business logic should be implemented in the client application.

createListingInStore(uint256,string,stri.notice: Create a new listing in the marketplace and returns its generated id. Indexing of listings always starts at 1.

disableListing(uint256).notice: Disable the given listing by updating its state to INACTIVE (2)

getListing(uint256).notice: Returns all information about a listing in the marketplace as a tuple

listingSold(uint256).notice: Updates the given listing to SOLD state
